aws::graph::propositions: # Meteorological Information and Flight Plan for Accident at Glacier Park International Airport
The accident site had Visual Meteorological Conditions (VMC).
The condition of light at the accident site was Day.
The observation facility was Glacier Park International Airport (KGPI).
Glacier Park International Airport (KGPI) has an elevation of 2,977 feet mean sea level.
The accident site was 0 Nautical Miles from Glacier Park International Airport (KGPI).
The observation time was 16:55 Local.
The direction from the accident site was 0 degrees.
The lowest cloud condition was Clear.
The visibility was 10 miles.
There was no ceiling at the accident site.
The wind speed was 3 knots.
There were no wind gusts at the accident site.
The wind direction was not specified.
No turbulence was forecast.
No actual turbulence was reported.
No turbulence severity was forecast.
Turbulence severity actual was not applicable.
The altimeter setting was 29.86 inches of mercury.
The temperature was 24 degrees Celsius.
The dew point was 7 degrees Celsius.
There was no obscuration at the accident site.
There was no precipitation at the accident site.
The departure point was Kalispell, Montana (GPI).
No flight plan was filed.
The destination was Eureka, Montana (88M).
The type of clearance was Visual Flight Rules (VFR).
The departure time was 17:00 Local.
The type of airspace was Class D.

text:
# Meteorological Information and Flight Plan

## Conditions at Accident Site: Visual (VMC)
Condition of Light: Day

## Observation Facility, Elevation: KGPI,2977 ft msl
Distance from Accident Site: 0 Nautical Miles

## Observation Time: 16:55 Local
Direction from Accident Site: 0

## Lowest Cloud Condition: Clear
Visibility 10 miles

## Lowest Ceiling: None
Visibility (RVR):

## Wind Speed/Gusts: 3 knots /
Turbulence Type Forecast/Actual:  / None

## Wind Direction:
Turbulence Severity Forecast/Actual:  / N/A

## Altimeter Setting: 29.86 inches Hg
Temperature/Dew Point: 24C / 7C

## Precipitation and Obscuration: No Obscuration; No Precipitation

## Departure Point: Kalispell, MT (GPI )
Type of Flight Plan Filed: None

## Destination: Eureka, MT (88M )
Type of Clearance: VFR

## Departure Time: 17:00 Local
Type of Airspace: Class D

---
